# Overview


![](www/workflow0.jpg){width=100%}



::: {.callout-tip collapse="true"}
### Table: Steps & resources

| What                     | Resources |
|--------------------------|-----------|
| Search for reusable data | Research data centers have searchable databases <br/>[re3data.org](https://www.re3data.org/), <br />[Verbund FDB](https://www.forschungsdaten-bildung.de/), <br />[Open ICPSR (USA)](https://www.openicpsr.org/openicpsr/)<br />[UK Data Archive (UK)](https://www.data-archive.ac.uk/) |
| Sharing for reuse or transparency | Costs: How much effort is required? Consent for reuse available?<br />Benefits: Analysis potential, Quality of data |
| Data management plan | Templates/Tools<br />[DMP template (ERC)](http://erc.europa.eu/sites/default/files/document/file/ERC-Data-Management-Plan.docx)<br />[Online tool (Open Aire)](https://argos.openaire.eu/home)<br />[Online tool "DataWiz" (ZPID)](https://datawiz.leibniz-psychology.org/DataWiz/?datawiz_locale=en)<br /><br />Standard<br />[D-Psy-FAIR (ZPID)](https://doi.org/10.23668/psycharchives.12180) |
| Decide for a repository or RDC | Research data center:<br />Search: [re3data.org](https://www.re3data.org/)<br />[Verbund FDB (education, Germany)](https://www.forschungsdaten-bildung.de/)<br />[Open ICPSR (USA)](https://www.openicpsr.org/openicpsr/)<br />[UK Data Archive (UK)](https://www.data-archive.ac.uk/)<br /><br />Repositories<br />[Zenodo](https://zenodo.org/)<br />[osf.io](https://osf.io/) |
| Informed consent | &#127482;&#127480; [Recommendations of ICPSR](https://www.icpsr.umich.edu/web/pages/datamanagement/confidentiality/conf-language.html)<br />&#127468;&#127463; [Information, samples and model forms of UK Data Service](https://ukdataservice.ac.uk/learning-hub/research-data-management/ethical-issues/consent-for-data-sharing/)<br />&#127465;&#127466; [Information, samples and model forms of VerbundFDB](https://www.forschungsdaten-bildung.de/handreichungen)<br />&#127475;&#127473; [Good overview with Dos and Don'ts, University of Utrecht](https://www.uu.nl/en/research/research-data-management/guides/legal-considerations/how-to-write-an-informed-consent-form)<br /><br />[Overview + links (ZPID), English](https://datawizkb.leibniz-psychology.org/index.php/before-my-project-starts/informed-consent/)<br />[Explanations + definitions (Michigan Tech), US](https://www.mtu.edu/research/integrity/docs/michigan-tech-hrpp-standard-operations-procedures.pdf)<br />[Checklist, German](https://doi.org/10.25656/01:22297)<br />[Template, German standard language](https://doi.org/10.25656/01:22301)<br />[Template, German plain language](https://doi.org/10.25656/01:22302)<br />[Template (qualitative data), German](https://www.qualiservice.org/de/datenschutz.html)<br />[Explanations + template (DGPs), German](https://zwpd.transmit.de/images/zwpd/dienstleistungen/ethikkommission/0.1a_datenschutzrechtliche_empfehlungen_einwilligungforschungsvorhaben.pdf) |
| Create codebook | R Package [`codebook`](https://rubenarslan.github.io/codebook/articles/codebook_tutorial.html)<br />codebook from [DataWiz](https://datawiz.leibniz-psychology.org/DataWiz/) <br />Institute of Education Science's ["Guidelines for a Codebook"](https://ies.ed.gov/ncee/rel/regions/central/pdf/CE5.3.2-Guidelines-for-a-Codebook.pdf)<br />Information by ICPSR on ["What is a Codebook?"](https://www.icpsr.umich.edu/web/ICPSR/cms/1983)|

:::
